member.name: T:LowercaseRoutesMVC4.HttpRouteCollectionExtensions
member.summary: Contains extension methods to map HTTP routes to lowercase URLs.

member.name: M:LowercaseRoutesMVC4.HttpRouteCollectionExtensions.MapHttpRouteLowercase(System.Web.Http.HttpRouteCollection,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Maps the specified route template.
member.returns: A reference to the mapped route.
member.param: A collection of routes for the application.
The name of the route to map.
The route template for the route.

member.name: M:LowercaseRoutesMVC4.HttpRouteCollectionExtensions.MapHttpRouteLowercase(System.Web.Http.HttpRouteCollection,System.String,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Maps the specified route template and sets default constraints.
member.returns: A reference to the mapped route.
member.param: A collection of routes for the application.
The name of the route to map.
The route template for the route.
An object that contains default route values.

member.name: M:LowercaseRoutesMVC4.HttpRouteCollectionExtensions.MapHttpRouteLowercase(System.Web.Http.HttpRouteCollection,System.String,System.String,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Maps the specified route template and sets default route values and constraints.
member.returns: A reference to the mapped route.
member.param: A collection of routes for the application.
The name of the route to map.
The route template for the route.
An object that contains default route values.
A set of expressions that specify values for routeTemplate.

member.name: T:LowercaseRoutesMVC4.RouteCollectionExtensions
member.summary: Contains extension methods to map routes to lowercase URLs.

member.name: M:LowercaseRoutesMVC4.RouteCollectionExtensions.MapRouteLowercase(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Maps the specified URL route using a lowercase URL. Does not change casing in the querystring, if any.
member.param: A collection of routes for the application.
The name of the route to map.
The URL pattern for the route.
member.returns: A reference to the mapped route.

member.name: M:LowercaseRoutesMVC4.RouteCollectionExtensions.MapRouteLowercase(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.String,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Maps the specified URL route using a lowercase URL and sets default route values. Does not change casing in the querystring, if any.
member.param: A collection of routes for the application.
The name of the route to map.
The URL pattern for the route.
An object that contains default route values.
member.returns: A reference to the mapped route.

member.name: M:LowercaseRoutesMVC4.RouteCollectionExtensions.MapRouteLowercase(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.String,System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Maps the specified URL route using a lowercase URL and sets the namespaces. Does not change casing in the querystring, if any.
member.param: A collection of routes for the application.
The name of the route to map.
The URL pattern for the route.
A set of namespaces for the application.
member.returns: A reference to the mapped route.

member.name: M:LowercaseRoutesMVC4.RouteCollectionExtensions.MapRouteLowercase(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.String,System.String,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Maps the specified URL route using a lowercase URL and sets default route values and constraints. Does not change casing in the querystring, if any.
member.param: A collection of routes for the application.
The name of the route to map.
The URL pattern for the route.
An object that contains default route values.
A set of expressions that specify valid values for a URL parameter.
member.returns: A reference to the mapped route.

member.name: T:LowercaseRoutesMVC4.AreaRegistrationContextExtensions
member.summary: Contains extension methods to map routes in Areas to lowercase URLs.

member.name: M:LowercaseRoutesMVC4.AreaRegistrationContextExtensions.MapRouteLowercase(System.Web.Mvc.AreaRegistrationContext,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Maps the specified URL route using a lowercase URL and associates it with the area that is specified by the AreaName property. Does not change casing in the querystring, if any.
member.param: The context that encapsulates the information that is required in order to register an area within an ASP.NET MVC application.
The name of the route.
The URL pattern for the route.
member.returns: A reference to the mapped route.

member.name: M:LowercaseRoutesMVC4.AreaRegistrationContextExtensions.MapRouteLowercase(System.Web.Mvc.AreaRegistrationContext,System.String,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Maps the specified URL route using a lowercase URL and associates it with the area that is specified by the AreaName property, using the specified route default values. Does not change casing in the querystring, if any.
member.param: The context that encapsulates the information that is required in order to register an area within an ASP.NET MVC application.
The name of the route.
The URL pattern for the route.
An object that contains default route values.
member.returns: A reference to the mapped route.

member.name: M:LowercaseRoutesMVC4.AreaRegistrationContextExtensions.MapRouteLowercase(System.Web.Mvc.AreaRegistrationContext,System.String,System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Maps the specified URL route using a lowercase URL and associates it with the area that is specified by the AreaName property, using the specified namespaces. Does not change casing in the querystring, if any.
member.param: The context that encapsulates the information that is required in order to register an area within an ASP.NET MVC application.
The name of the route.
The URL pattern for the route.
A set of namespaces for the application.
member.returns: A reference to the mapped route.

member.name: M:LowercaseRoutesMVC4.AreaRegistrationContextExtensions.MapRouteLowercase(System.Web.Mvc.AreaRegistrationContext,System.String,System.String,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Maps the specified URL route using a lowercase URL and associates it with the area that is specified by the AreaName property, using the specified route default values and constraints. Does not change casing in the querystring, if any.
member.param: The context that encapsulates the information that is required in order to register an area within an ASP.NET MVC application.
The name of the route.
The URL pattern for the route.
An object that contains default route values.
A set of expressions that specify valid values for a URL parameter.
member.returns: A reference to the mapped route.

member.name: M:LowercaseRoutesMVC4.AreaRegistrationContextExtensions.MapRouteLowercase(System.Web.Mvc.AreaRegistrationContext,System.String,System.String,System.Object,System.String[])
member.summary: Maps the specified URL route using a lowercase URL and associates it with the area that is specified by the AreaName property, using the specified route default values and namespaces. Does not change casing in the querystring, if any.
member.param: The context that encapsulates the information that is required in order to register an area within an ASP.NET MVC application.
The name of the route.
The URL pattern for the route.
An object that contains default route values.
A set of namespaces for the application.
member.returns: A reference to the mapped route.

member.name: M:LowercaseRoutesMVC4.AreaRegistrationContextExtensions.MapRouteLowercase(System.Web.Mvc.AreaRegistrationContext,System.String,System.String,System.Object,System.Object,System.String[])
member.summary: Maps the specified URL route using a lowercase URL and associates it with the area that is specified by the AreaName property, using the specified route default values, constraints, and namespaces. Does not change casing in the querystring, if any.
member.param: The context that encapsulates the information that is required in order to register an area within an ASP.NET MVC application.
The name of the route.
The URL pattern for the route.
An object that contains default route values.
A set of expressions that specify valid values for a URL parameter.
A set of namespaces for the application.
member.returns: A reference to the mapped route.
